name: Buissy.com Ltd
overview:
The B2B Marketplace for Business Software, Buissy.com, is a Business Software directory that includes business software for 19 categories and offers the possibility for purchasers to find software and also compare software that suits their company the best.

The business software vendors (mostly suppliers of SaaS or Web Software), who are adding software to the business software directory, are able to include extensive information about their products, like for example long description, screenshots, YouTube video, logo and links. There are also possibilities to market the product using ads, both on the first page and on each category page.

Buissy.com is a B2B Marketplace for both local and international markets, enabling the possibility for software vendors to describe their products in several other languages except for English. The whole website is also available in different languages.

The purpose for Buissy.com is to provide a software marketplace to help purchasers find the best software by staying at Buissy.com as long as possible and therefore mostly deliver high quality leads to the business software vendors.
